Course_Title: Instruction in Early Childhood Education Derived from Development Theories
Program_Policies: Some courses may require prerequisites.; For a Minor in Early Development and Education, a minimum of 20 credits is required.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
